contentrichtext.text: '''[[Saint Jerome]]''' is a Christian church father, best known for translating the Bible into Latin. '''Saint Jerome''' may also refer to: *[[Jerome of Pavia]] (d.787), Bishop of Pavia * [[Saint Jerome Emiliani]] (1486–1537), Italian humanitarian, founder of the Somaschi Fathers * Saint Jerome Hermosilla, one of the [[Vietnamese Martyrs]] * [[Saint-Jérôme, Quebec]], Canada * [[Saint Jerome of Cotalba Monastery]], Alfauir, (Valencia), Spain * Saint Jerome, a song by Jason Schwartzman's solo-musical project Coconut Records for his 2009 album ''[[Davy (album)|Davy]]'' {{disambig}} [[Category:Human name disambiguation pages|Jerome]]
